description:
'''Errol Kojo Bellot''', known professionally as '''Kojo Funds''' ({{IPAc-en|k|oʊ|dʒ|oʊ|_|f|ʌ|n|d|z}} {{Respell|KOH|joh|_|FUNDZ}}; born 30 March 1995), is an English singer, rapper and songwriter. His music blends West African and Caribbean sounds with [[road rap]], [[dancehall]] and [[British pop music|pop]]. 

Kojo Funds featured on [[Yxng Bane]]'s single "Fine Wine" and on [[Mabel (singer)|Mabel]]'s "[[Finders Keepers (Mabel song)|Finders Keepers]]". His own singles include "Check" with [[Raye]].
